title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 74.5 - Application for inclusion in the plan as a participating employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 74.5 - Application for inclusion in the plan as a participating employer

State Regulations

Any public authority, public benefit corporation, or
quasi-public organization of the State may apply for the inclusion of its
employees in the plan by submitting to the president a certified copy of a
resolution of its governing body electing such inclusion, which resolution
shall be in a form approved by the president. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
74.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
